sentences.english: The bulk of the railroad workers voted to go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 大多數鐵路工人投票義馬市竊聽器同意規復事變。

sentences.english: It is far preferable take things as they come along with patience and equanimity.
sentences.chinese: 耐心鎮靜地接受世事變遷，是最好的處事之道。

sentences.english: It is presentative that human affairs changes, show the change of company strategy fully rear.
sentences.chinese: 人事變動是表象，背後透露出企業戰略的變化。

sentences.english: The poet metamorphoses the everyday into the universal.
sentences.chinese: 詩人把日常的事變爲普遍性的事。

sentences.english: The first part of the historical background of the Mukden Incident.

sentences.english: The importance of "Huabei Accident" in history is re-appraised.
sentences.chinese: 重新評價了“華北事變”的歷史地位。

sentences.english: In the Marco Polo Bridge Incident, she organized the women to go to frontline services.
sentences.chinese: 在蘆溝橋事變後，她組織婦女戰地服務團赴前線服務。

sentences.english: My in the mind is matchless and depressed, does the die fox have no incident person fashion why?
sentences.chinese: 我心裏無比鬱悶，死狐狸沒事變人樣幹嘛？

sentences.english: The book is about the July 7th Incident.
sentences.chinese: 這本書是關於七七事變的。

sentences.english: Finding work life balance begins with learning to say no.
sentences.chinese: 要想找到事變與生存的均衡點，起重要學會說不。

sentences.english: The incident left him unstrung and incapable of rational effort.
sentences.chinese: 這一事變讓他焦慮不安，不能採取理智的措施。

sentences.english: The Xi'an Incident is also called the “Double-Twelfth Incident”.
sentences.chinese: 西安事變，也叫“雙十二事變”。

sentences.chinese: 西安事變，也叫“雙十二事變”。

sentences.english: We should analyze the cause and effect of this event.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該分析這場事變的因果。

sentences.english: I'll put everything in black and white!
sentences.chinese: 我會把所有事變白紙黑字寫清楚。

sentences.english: The second part of the outbreak of the Mukden Incident and the fall of the Northeast.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲九一八事變的爆發與東北淪陷。
